remarks:
Rearrange three restricted existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.) 

---

 Rearrange three existential quantifiers.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.)
statement:
3reeanv $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B E. z e. C ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) <-> ( E. x e. A ph /\ E. y e. B ps /\ E. z e. C ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d B x z $.
$d C x y $.
$d ch x y $.
$d ph y z $.
$d ps x z $.
